title: Bobby Gives First Ever ‘Employee Of The Month Award' + Amy’s Husband Embarrassed Her + What Scared Bobby This Weekend?
itunes:title: Bobby Gives First Ever ‘Employee Of The Month Award' + Amy’s Husband Embarrassed Her + What Scared Bobby This Weekend?
description:
Bobby gives out the first ever “Employee of the Month” award. They win $100 and get to do any segment of the show this week. Amy says her husband embarrassed her when he said “I gotta take a leak”….we debate if it’s acceptable? We do our draft of best looking celebrities over the age of 50. Plus, what made Bobby scared for this life this weekend!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
